pages.text:
There are three categories of fleshborn:
1. Fleshborn that are symbiotic organisms (i.e. both of you benefit together; e.g. heal each other)
2. Fleshborn that are parasitic organisms (e.g. consume your vitality regardless of your current health situation â†’ death)
3. Fleshborn that are exploited organisms (e.g. they do your bidding without compensation)
